title: Christmas Shorts: True stories for young and old
features: True Christmas and holiday stories from the life of Dr. Rayna M. Gangi.
description: Rayna M. Gangi has several books in different genres, including her non-fiction books on holistic health, "Forget the Cures, Find the Cause," her historical novel on "Mary Jemison-The True Story," and her series that includes "Souls of the Fire" and her co-authored title "No Matter What."

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/3bknm6trqr31r94bgnart4lvc._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Rayna M. Gangi', 'about': ['I have spent my life pursuing my reason for being. From the military to money management to holistic health and kids, I have explored my heart, my choices, and the path my soul has asked me to travel.', 'My writing incoporates many of these things while integrating reality and the stumbling blocks we all face in our quest for the ultimate destination, love.
